author: Ed Kilgore
title: Georgia Governor Shows Remarkable Ignorance About How the Coronavirus Spreads
description: Brian Kemp finally paid attention to evidence that asymptomatic people can transmit the illness, and imposed a tardy stay-at-home order.
content: Yesterday, Georgia governor Brian Kemp joined fellow Trump-friendly Republican chief executives Ron DeSantis of Florida and Tate Reeves of Mississippi in relenting to widespread pressure and issuing a statewide stay-at-home order. What made this particular ch… [+4238 chars]
